participant_1.background:
Horror movies are my favorites.
I have a son who is in junior high school.
I am a stay at home dad.
I spent a decade working in the human services field.
My father used to work for home depot.

participant_2.background:
My favorite kind of movie is a documentary.
I read a book every week.
I started a new job as a pa three months ago.
I live with my husband in pennsylvania.

content.text: What was the last movie you watched?
I just watched a documentary about the history of the US.
That sounds interesting. What did you think of it?
It was really good! I learned a lot about the country's founding and how it has changed over time.
That's great. I love learning about history.
Me too! I think it's important to know where we came from in order to understand where we're going.
I agree. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read. I read a book every week.
That's awesome! I used to love to read, but I don't have as much time for it anymore.
You should make time for it! Reading is a great way to relax and learn new things.
I know, I know. I'll try to read more.
Good! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I'm especially interested in history and science.
Me too! I love learning about the world around us.
I know, right? It's so interesting to learn about all the different cultures and the way people live.
It sure is! I love traveling, too. I've been to a few different countries, but I'd love to visit more.
I've been to a few countries too, but I'd love to travel more as well.
We should go on a trip together sometime!
That would be awesome! I'd love to explore the world with you.
